text: Katrine Kristensen (born 23 January 1996) (alternate link) is a Danish para- equestrian. She won a silver medal in the Individual championship test grade II at the 2024 Summer Paralympics. Kristensen also won three medals at the 2022 FEI World Championships. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Danish dressage riders Category:Paralympic equestrians Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Danish sportspeople
title: Katrine Kristensen
